Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 17 Feb 2019Just look at the premium compared to other age groups. That will give u an idea how 'rare' it is. It will be hard to find statistic for all the 'critical illnesses', not even to mention claims experience from any of the insurers. If u want more narrow stats like children cancer, it will be easier. According to KKH, Children (under 15yo) makes up about 1% of all cancer cases in Singapore, about 90-100 new cases are detected each year.
